mapper.select: SELECT userId, userName, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, allow FROM member OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET allow = #{allow} WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT sellerId, sellerName, email, tel, allow FROM seller OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE seller SET allow = #{allow} WHERE sellerId=#{sellerId}
mapper.select: SELECT eventNum, sellerId, subject, TO_CHAR(start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')as start_date, TO_CHAR(end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')as end_date, allow FROM event OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET allow=#{allow} WHERE eventNum=#{eventNum}
